page.title: 12RECREATION
page.content: {Ellon Community Centre}offers a variety of activities including: {indoor swimming, large games hall and {an outdoor sports field.}Some swimming classes are provided especially for the elderly, the disabled and mother and toddler groups. There are organised activities by the Community Centre such as{canoeing, windsurfing {and rock climbing.}In the evenings there are{youth clubs}run by leaders from the Community Centre. Flowing through the town of Ellon is the River Ythan which provides very good {angling. Bowling}is a popular pass-time in Ellon, as the town has its own Bowling Green and club. There are also many other private clubs such as:{squash, rifle, golf and cricket {clubs.}Another recreational area is Gordon Park, a large sports field catering for{rugby and football.
